turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Honestly, all of it! But I'm particularly worried about the system design portion. I've never actually designed a system from scratch, only implemented parts of existing ones. How do I even begin to approach a system design question like 'Design a URL shortener?'

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question! For a URL shortener design, you'd want to consider factors like: the scale of the system (number of URLs, QPS), high availability, and data consistency.
